explanations.A: Remember n × (a/b) = (n × a)/b so 9 x (2/5) = (9 x 2)/5
explanations.B: You have accidentally multiplied both the numerator and denominator. Remember n × (a/b) = (n × a)/b...
explanations.C: You have accidentally multiplied the denominator by 9 but you need to multiply the numerator by 9 because n × (a/b) = (n × a)/b...
explanations.D: This would be equivalent to 9 ÷ 2/5, we are multiplying. Remember n × (a/b) = (n × a)/b...
